column2: obxjulz, 7-12 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Caregiver)
lesley, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I took this medication last night due to stuffy nose/ headcold/sinus headcold. my husband said I was talking out of my head, saying crazy things! All I remember is I felt like I had drank a 12 pack of beer!! I did not like how it made me feel. This is the strongest med I have ever taking for cold! I would not recomend this at all!! especially for kids! I am 35 years old and it knocked me out! It was kinda like a date rape drug. I couldnt remember anything after I started feeling so drunk I couldnt even hold my head up!!

column2: Ray, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I take this med when I have a cold & cough & flu like symtoms. Works quite well for me. For those who reviewed with under age 12 children, read interactions. Not recommended for those under 12.

column2: kayahele, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: given to 9 yr. worked okay. made her dizzy so could not give during the day because she had school

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I has flu-like symtoms. I took 4 doses of this medicine over a 3 day period and my symptoms were completely gone. Other than the taste this is an excellent medication.

column2: mom2cait, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: I gave this medication to my daughter, who is 11 years old (Dr. gave us some to relieve cold symptoms)....... a short while later, she said "this stuff works but I'm NEVER taking it again". She was VERY groggy and didn't like the feeling. Then she was totally passed out on the couch for a solid 3 hours. I'll never use it again. She felt awful and 'drugged' the rest of the night.

column2: Tiffany, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: When I gave this medicine to my son i was expecting him to finally get some sleep, since he and I had both been up because of his illness. Well, the complete opposite happened. He was running, screaming, and just acting like a crazy person. I will not give this to him anymore. I call it baby crack!

column2: 3-6 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My 3.5 year old was on this for cold symptoms.  It made him absolutely crazy, no joke.  He would scream/cry for no reason and he was very "evil".  He's never like that at all.  He's a calm, well-behaved, loving child yet while he was on VazoTan, we called him the "little demon".  It also made going to sleep and staying asleep almost impossible.  I stopped giving it to him and threw it all in the trash.

column1: Inflammation of the Nose due to an Allergy

column9: iT REALLY MADE ME HAVE A DROWSY AND HUNG OVER FEELING... THE NEXT DAY.. VERY TIRED.

column9: Had a chronic cough for two years and vazotan was the first thing that ever made it better.
